services.name: Single Dental Implant
services.insurance: Partially covered by most PPO plans (typically $1,000-$2,000)

services.name: All-on-4/6/8 Full-Arch Restoration

pricing.type: Variable - depends on number of implants and materials

services.timeframe: Same day - walk out with new smile

features: No impact on credit score (soft pull)

insurance.medicare: Implants not covered, but discounts on extractions/diagnostics available

keyFeatures: On-site lab (365 Dental Lab) for immediate adjustments

faq.question: How much does a single implant cost?
faq.answer: Pricing varies based on case complexity. We provide personalized quotes after free consultation. Use our calculator for instant estimate with promo code.

faq.question: What is the cost of full mouth restoration?
faq.answer: Full-arch (All-on-4/6/8) pricing depends on number of implants, materials (acrylic vs zirconia), and additional procedures needed. Calculator provides personalized quote.

faq.question: Do you offer payment plans?
faq.answer: Yes - $0 down, 48-90 month terms, 85%+ approval rate, 600+ credit score accepted, instant decision in 60 seconds.

faq.question: Does insurance cover dental implants?
faq.answer: Most PPO plans provide partial coverage ($1,000-$2,000). HMO/DHMO not accepted. Medicare/Medicaid don't cover implants but we offer discounts on related services.

faq.question: How much is the consultation?
faq.answer: FREE (saves $650). Includes: 1-on-1 exam with Dr. Antipov, 3D CT scan, personalized treatment plan, transparent quote. No commitment required.

faq.question: Do you offer same-day implants?
faq.answer: Yes! Walk out with temporary teeth the same day implants are placed. On-site lab allows immediate adjustments.

faq.question: Can you do both upper and lower at the same time?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Dr. Antipov has extensive experience with full-mouth restorations in single surgery.

specialOffers: Special discounts for Medicare/Medicaid patients on extractions and diagnostics
